TopicTitle: Please help me install visual mods.

Articles.Content:
Well I really hate the looks of KSP but im having a really hard time installing visual mods, im very very unexpierenced. Pls help me.

Edited April 7, 2019 by GalacticEmporer
Edited it cuz of my spelling (:

So what visual mods would you like to install? Tell me and I can help you. If you don't know here are a few visual packs to choose between:

- Stock Visual Enhancements

- Astronomer's Visual Pack

- Spectra Visual Compilation

In my opinion Astronomer's Visual Pack looks the best but it's also harder for your PC to run (lower FPS) so I don't recommend it if you have a weak computer. Spectra and SVE gives you more FPS in-game.

You can pair these visual packs together with other mods like DistantObjectEnhancement, PlanetShine, ReStock, RealPlume, skyboxes and sunflares. So if you can figure out what visual mods you want I can help you install them

Yes, like SVE and the Astronomer''s pack.

Just all things i can install actually.  

 

Im running a pretty beefy setup so i think i can run Astronomer''s pack.

Edited April 6, 2019 by GalacticEmporer
Take a look at this thread, might answer most of your questions.
